unnormalised: Real Estate Buzz: Rent Agreement Blues Got You Down?
normalised: Real Estate Buzz: Rent Agreement Blues Got You Down?

unnormalised: Mumbai: Renting in the city of dreams can feel more like a nightmare, right? Landlords and tenants, listen up! Changes are brewing in rental agreement norms that could make things easier than finding a seat on a local train at peak hour.
normalised: Mumbai: Renting in the city of dreams can feel more like a nightmare, right? Landlords and tenants, listen up! Changes are brewing in rental agreement norms that could make things easier than finding a seat on a local train at peak hour.

unnormalised: Sources say the Maharashtra Rent Control Act could be getting a much-needed update. Think clearer clauses, standardized formats, and less scope for "hera pheri" – much like the Bollywood movie, minus the chaos, hopefully!
normalised: Sources say the Maharashtra Rent Control Act could be getting a much-needed update. Think clearer clauses, standardized formats, and less scope for "hera pheri" – much like the Bollywood movie, minus the chaos, hopefully!

unnormalised: Experts from IIT Bombay are even reportedly consulting on incorporating tech solutions for online registration and dispute resolution. No more running around to the Registrar's office!
normalised: Experts from I I T Bombay are even reportedly consulting on incorporating tech solutions for online registration and dispute resolution. No more running around to the Registrar's office!

unnormalised: But before you start dreaming of hassle-free rentals, remember to always read the fine print. Check for lock-in periods, maintenance responsibilities (who's fixing that leaky tap?), and those dreaded "society charges."
normalised: But before you start dreaming of hassle-free rentals, remember to always read the fine print. Check for lock-in periods, maintenance responsibilities (who's fixing that leaky tap?), and those dreaded "society charges."

unnormalised: Negotiate wisely, document everything, and remember, a little bit of "samajhdari" can go a long way in this 'maya nagari'. Happy renting, folks! And don't forget to pay your rent on time, warna… well, you know the drill! Maybe next time, we will discuss security deposits which can easily reach Rs. 20,000 these days.
normalised: Negotiate wisely, document everything, and remember, a little bit of "samajhdari" can go a long way in this 'maya nagari'. Happy renting, folks! And don't forget to pay your rent on time, warna… well, you know the drill! Maybe next time, we will discuss security deposits which can easily reach rupee twenty thousand these days.
